title: Archive for 2012
description: Olympic gold medalist Usain Bolt been seeing a German sports doctor who uses homeopathy since he was 16.
cleaned_text: December 2012 at 10:23 Olympic sprinter Usain Bolt has been seeing a homeopath since he was 16 years of age and is positive about the close relationship they have had throughout his record-breaking career. To read all about Bolt's experiences of
